mapper.select: select id, '('||NICKNAME||') '||title as "title", to_char(startday,'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start", to_char(endday,'YYYY-MM-DD') as "end", color.color from CALENDAR inner join USER_LIST using(id) inner join color using (agree_flag) where DELETE_FLAG = #{delete_flag}

select ceil(count(i)/10) from CALENDAR inner join USER_LIST using(id)
where name = #{name} and DELETE_FLAG =0
where DELETE_FLAG = 0
mapper.update: update CALENDAR set DELETE_FLAG = 1 where i in #{i}
update CALENDAR set AGREE_FLAG = #{agree_flag} where i in #{i.value}
mapper.select: select i,title, type, to_char(STARTDAY,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "startday", to_char(endday,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "endday",name, content from CALENDAR inner join USER_LIST using (id) where i = #{i}
select id,nickname from USER_LIST where NAME = #{name}
